title: Blue Light Filter 2 Hours Before Bed
description: Use blue light filters on devices or wear blue light blocking glasses to improve sleep quality
instructions:
1. Set automatic blue light filters on all devices (f.lux, Night Shift, etc.)
2. Enable filters 2 hours before planned bedtime
3. Consider blue light blocking glasses for extended evening screen time
4. Dim room lighting and avoid bright screens when possible
equipment: blue light filtering app or glasses

title: Optimal Bedroom Temperature (16-19°C)
description: Maintain cool bedroom temperature for deeper sleep and easier sleep onset
instructions:
1. Set bedroom temperature between 16-19°C (60-67°F)
2. Use breathable bedding materials (cotton, bamboo)
3. Consider a fan for air circulation
4. Avoid heavy blankets that trap heat
5. Check temperature 30 minutes before sleep
